ThreadContext Class Reference

This class wraps up all the events and status variables necessary to maintain a thread in the thread pool managed by TaskManagerTP. All members are public to simplify access. More...

Detailed Description

This class wraps up all the events and status variables necessary to maintain a thread in the thread pool managed by TaskManagerTP. All members are public to simplify access.

See also:
TaskManagerTP

Member Typedef Documentation

typedef void(* ThreadContext::ThreadCallback)(void *pThreadData)

This type is used for arbitrary callbacks dispatched from the BasicThreadPool.

See also:
BasicThreadPool::NonStandardThreadExecute

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum ThreadContext::Status

This type is used to indicate state of the ThreadContext.
